name: Save Piggy - single-player adventure game
description:
【$2.99 ---> free】
◆Anniversary ceremony(○^～^○),original price:$2.99,now free for a while!
【No IAP】
◆Completely free！No IAP(In App Purchase)！ You can play the game without spending money!

【Features】
◆60 special missions
◆9 different game modes
◆Game Center support
◆Challenge players from across the world
◆Colorful and vivid HD graphics
◆Smooth, polished touch interaction
◆Deep sea adventure
◆And..... more to come

【Device Compatibility】
◆iPhone4/4s/5/5c/5s/6/6plus/6s/6s plus/7/7plus
◆iPad 2/The new iPad/iPad with Retina display/iPad Air/iPad Air 2/iPad Pro
◆iPad mini 2/3/4
◆iPod touch 4/5

【OS version】
◆iOS 6.1 or later

【Feedback】
◆We'd love to get your feedback.
◆E-mail:crabsoft@hotmail.com
◆Twitter:@Crabsoft

Good luck!Have fun!(○^～^○)
